categories: Category:Moffs and Grand Moffs of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Larcet was a male Moff of the Sith Empire during the Cold War who fancied himself an antiquities collector. He hired treasure hunters to retrieve a hoard of artifacts that he learned of from a "trustworthy source," though the source unsuccessfully attempted to betray the Moff.
In a newer update of the game Star Wars: The Old Republic, the description of the crewskill describes Larcet as Colonel instead of a Moff.
